data

Class AdministrationDataAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.AdministrationDataAccess

  • public class AdministrationDataAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    This data-access class contains methods required to fulfill administration responsibilities.

        the boolean for termination success

      • resetUserPassword

        public static boolean resetUserPassword(java.lang.String userName,
                                        java.lang.String adminName,
                                        java.lang.String temporaryPassword,
                                        java.lang.String userSalt)
        This method calls the stored procedures required to reset a user's password. First, the resetUserPassword procedure is called to allow for the password update. Then the password is replaced by the temporary password in the changeUserPassword procedure. Finally, the resetUserPassword procedure is called again to allow the user to change the password after signing in with the temporary password.
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name
        adminName - the administrator user name
        temporaryPassword - the temporary password
        userSalt - the salt
        Returns:
        the boolean for success or failure

      • addUser

        public static boolean addUser(java.lang.String userName,
                              java.lang.String firstName,
                              java.lang.String lastName,
                              java.lang.String jobTitle,
                              java.lang.String userPassword,
                              java.lang.String userSalt,
                              java.lang.String emailAddress)
        This method invokes the database procedure for adding a new user to the registry.
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name
        firstName - the first name
        lastName - the last name
        jobTitle - the job title
        userPassword - the password
        userSalt - the salt
        emailAddress - the user's email address
        Returns:
        the boolean indicating the success or failure of the operation
